body: There, I said it. Those made-up snowflake tumblr genders are ridiculous. "fluid cat socialist bluehaired ahs snowflake" isn't a gender. You're either a boy or a girl (or in rare cases both or neither, but that's still combinations of the two).

body: This is not as unpopular as you think. The silent (and sane) majority have held this as a general consensus and went undisputed for thousands of years. There are a few reality-impaired groups such as online echo chambers and modern universities (which gave up on teaching anything practical on account of lacking those skills and resorted to teaching things they just make up) that are just, for the moment, louder than the rest of the us.

body: I think your more rejecting gender as a social construct. But the thing is gender is inherently related to the [SSSM](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Standard_social_science_model?wprov=SFLA1) (socialization) model. Gender as a term didn't really exist until recently, and doesn't make sense if you reject social influence. The more appropriate term biologically would be "sex".
body_html: I think your more rejecting gender as a social construct. But the thing is gender is inherently related to the SSSM (socialization) model. Gender as a term didn't really exist until recently, and doesn't make sense if you reject social influence. The more appropriate term biologically would be "sex".

body: No, I'm just saying there's only two. I get the difference, but gender still derives from concepts of sex, so "fragile" and "astral" or whatever else that has nothing to do with male or female makes no sense as genders.

author.bio: I suffer from the heartbreak of re-revitiligo. A tragic congenital condition that causes my skin to be deficient in soul giving melanin, making me appear pale and lifeless, like a caucasian.
author.bio_html: I suffer from the heartbreak of re-revitiligo. A tragic congenital condition that causes my skin to be deficient in soul giving melanin, making me appear pale and lifeless, like a caucasian.

body:
Gender originally comes from the latin "Generare"

"to engender, beget, produce" (see generation). Related: Gendered; gendering.

Gender means "class of reproduction type."

If you dont represent a member of the scientifically recognized reproductive diad, then you are not a viable reproducer or "gender." You would be "non-gendered."

So there are only two genders possible, with a third type of person which would be the abnormal, "genderless" or "gender confused" person.

The idea of "essential" sexual orientations has been routinely debunked. There is a basic mutable sex drive that is influenced heavily by cultural social cues. There are only personal sexual "preferences" and "perversions." Kinks are not genders. They are not representative of the reproductive process, just a reaction to deprevation of "normal" sexual outlets.
body_html:
Gender originally comes from the latin "Generare"

"to engender, beget, produce" (see generation). Related: Gendered; gendering.

Gender means "class of reproduction type."

If you dont represent a member of the scientifically recognized reproductive diad, then you are not a viable reproducer or "gender." You would be "non-gendered."

So there are only two genders possible, with a third type of person which would be the abnormal, "genderless" or "gender confused" person.

The idea of "essential" sexual orientations has been routinely debunked. There is a basic mutable sex drive that is influenced heavily by cultural social cues. There are only personal sexual "preferences" and "perversions." Kinks are not genders. They are not representative of the reproductive process, just a reaction to deprevation of "normal" sexual outlets.

body: But those aren't genders. They can be identities for something else, but not gender. If you don't identify with either gender that's fine, but that doesn't make more of them, there's still only two. Almost all of those fake "genders" are just personality types completely independent of gender.
body_html: But those aren't genders. They can be identities for something else, but not gender. If you don't identify with either gender that's fine, but that doesn't make more of them, there's still only two. Almost all of those fake "genders" are just personality types completely independent of gender.
